title: A Golden Decade of Deep Learning: Computing Systems & Applications
abstract: Abstract The past decade has seen tremendous progress in the field of artificial intelligence thanks to the resurgence of neural networks through deep learning. This has helped improve the ability for computers to see, hear, and understand the world around them, leading to dramatic advances in the application of AI to many fields of science and other areas of human endeavor. In this essay, I examine the reasons for this progress, including the confluence of progress in computing hardware designed to accelerate machine learning and the emergence of open-source software frameworks to dramatically expand the set of people who can use machine learning effectively. I also present a broad overview of some of the areas in which machine learning has been applied over the past decade. Finally, I sketch out some likely directions from which further progress in artificial intelligence will come.
tldr_ja: 過去10年間で、深層学習の進展により人工知能が大きく進化し、コンピュータの視覚や聴覚、理解能力が向上した。この進展は、機械学習を加速するための計算ハードウェアの進化とオープンソースソフトウェアの普及によるものであり、さまざまな分野への応用が進んでいる。今後の人工知能の進展の方向性についても考察されている。
